ResearchProjectDef.label: retractable claws
ResearchProjectDef.description: Explore the concept of using energized components to retract small claws quickly and efficiently into a bionic hand. Allows for the production of power claws and power arms at a bionics workbench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flexible claws
ResearchProjectDef.description: Optimise claw design and component usage to allow for claws to flex and unflex to improve dexterity. Allows for the production of advanced power arms.
